table_utils.sql_template: select --+PARALLEL(TRD_VOL_UNION,8) BLK_TRD_REF , BLTR_CD , COB_DT , CON_SETL_DT, ENTP_TRD_REF_NO, EXT_TRD_REF, FO_TRD_REF , OPS_SETL_SYS_TRD_REF , OPS_TRD_REF, TRD_REF_1, TRD_REF_2, TRD_REF_3, TRD_REF_4, TRD_REF_5 from ( SELECT /*+FULL(a) */* FROM csmartvol.TRD_VOL_UNION partition (aug_121) a UNION ALL SELECT /*+FULL(a) */* FROM csmartvol.TRD_VOL_UNION partition (aug_122) a union all SELECT /*+FULL(a) */* FROM csmartvol.TRD_VOL_UNION partition (jul_122) a union all SELECT /*+FULL(a) */* FROM csmartvol.TRD_VOL_UNION partition (may_121) a union all SELECT /*+FULL(a) */* FROM csmartvol.TRD_VOL_UNION partition (jun_121) a ) tvu where trunc(cob_dt) in ('04-May-2012','07-Jun-2012','24-Jul-2012','26-Jul-2012','27-Jul-2012','30-Jul-2012','31-Jul-2012','01-Aug-2012','02-Aug-2012','03-Aug-2012','06-Aug-2012','07-Aug-2012','08-Aug-2012','09-Aug-2012','10-Aug-2012','13-Aug-2012','14-Aug-2012','15-Aug-2012','16-Aug-2012','17-Aug-2012','20-Aug-2012','21-Aug-2012','22-Aug-2012','23-Aug-2012','24-Aug-2012') and TRD_TRAN_DT = tvu.COB_DT and METRICS_CAT = 'Volumes' and VOL_EVNT_TYP = 'Settlement Volume';
